full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Web Building Platform
==============================

### General Information
---------------

* **Reference Number**: cb-485-17694161
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-26

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: 24062-24-063
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-19T14:00:00 (EST)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-03-19
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Project Description
-------------------

Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) requests proposals from suppliers to provide Web Building Platform with Maintenance and Hosting services. The Web Building Platform will inform the financial management community of program activities and events, and will be user-friendly, accessible, bilingual, and easy to update and maintain. The current FMCD website will need to be replicated on the supplier’s Web Building Platform.

### Contract Details
-------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Ottawa

### Contact Information
-------------------

* **Name**: Dawn Dormer
* **Email**: Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (343) 542-8102
* **Fax**: None

### Attachment
-------------

* **Tender Notice Document**: English version [en] and French version [fr] are available on the Canadian Government’s procurement platform: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/
